title: Paragon Machine Works Celebrates 40 Years With Limited-Edition Multitool & Bottle Opener
content:
Richmond, Calif.'s longtime frame-building component manufacturer, Paragon Machine Works, releases a limited 40th-anniversary multitool!

The post Paragon Machine Works Celebrates 40 Years With Limited-Edition Multitool & Bottle Opener appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Ron Frazelle
